name: @yaga/leaflet-cached-tile-layer
description: A leaflet tile layer cached with @yaga/indexed-db-tile-cache

scripts.test: tslint ts/*.ts && tsc && istanbul instrument lib -o test-tmp && browserify test/index.js -o test/bundle.js && karma start karma.conf.js && rm -Rf test-tmp test/bundle.js
scripts.travis-test: tslint ts/*.ts && tsc && istanbul instrument lib -o test-tmp && browserify test/index.js -o test/bundle.js && karma start karma.conf.js --browsers Firefox && rm -Rf test-tmp test/bundle.js
scripts.browser-test: tsc; cp -R lib test-tmp && browserify test/index.js -o browser-test/bundle.js && rm -Rf test-tmp
scripts.build-example: tsc && cd example && tsc index.ts && cd .. && browserify example/index.js -o example/bundle.js

author: Arne Schubert <atd.schubert@gmail.com>
